value: islands off of western Sumatra (Simeulue, Babi, Banyak, and Siberut); formerly also on the Mentawai, Riau, and Lingga archipelagos surrounding Sumatra, and on the Anambas, Natunas, and Karimatas islands west of Borneo
Anamba Islands, Borneo, Bintang Island in the Rhio Archipelago, Sumatra, Mentawi Islands.
refer: Peter's Checklist of the Birds of the World

value: mangroves, woodland and coconut groves in the lowlands and hills of offshore islands, occasionally found in similar habitat below 100 m on
